item.name: Jobs - Enhanced

request.description: Get paginated list of jobs with advanced filters (TopCV style)
Search jobs with semantic search and advanced filters
Get detailed job information by ID
Get AI-powered job recommendations based on current job
Get AI-calculated match score between user and job
Get AI analysis of job skills and requirements
Generate personalized skill roadmap for job

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Frontend Developer Intern",
  "jobType": "internship",
  "category": "tech",
  "subCategory": "web-development",
  "companyId": "{{company_id}}",
  "internship": {
    "type": "summer",
    "duration": 3,
    "startDate": "2024-06-01",
    "endDate": "2024-09-01",
    "isPaid": true,
    "stipend": {
      "amount": 8000000,
      "currency": "VND",
      "period": "month",
      "isNegotiable": true
    },
    "academicCredit": true,
    "remoteOption": true,
    "flexibleHours": true
  },
  "requirements": {
    "education": {
      "level": "Bachelor",
      "majors": ["Computer Science", "Information Technology"],
      "minGpa": 3.0,
      "year": [2, 3, 4]
    },
    "skills": [
      {
        "skillId": "{{skill_id}}",
        "level": "required",
        "importance": 9
      },
      {
        "skillId": "{{skill_id_2}}",
        "level": "preferred",
        "importance": 7
      }
    ],
    "experience": {
      "minMonths": 0,
      "projectBased": true,
      "experienceLevel": "beginner"
    },
    "languages": [
      {
        "language": "English",
        "level": "intermediate"
      }
    ]
  },
  "description": "We are looking for a talented Frontend Developer Intern to join our team. You will work on modern web applications using React and JavaScript.",
  "responsibilities": [
    "Develop user interfaces using React",
    "Collaborate with design team",
    "Write clean, maintainable code",
    "Participate in code reviews"
  ],
  "requirements": [
    "Knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, CSS",
    "Basic understanding of React",
    "Good problem-solving skills",
    "Team player"
  ],
  "benefits": [
    "Flexible working hours",
    "Remote work options",
    "Learning opportunities",
    "Certificate upon completion"
  ],
  "learningOutcomes": [
    "Master React development",
    "Learn modern web development practices",
    "Gain real-world project experience",
    "Develop problem-solving skills"
  ],
  "location": {
    "type": "hybrid",
    "city": "Ho Chi Minh",
    "district": "District 1",
    "address": "123 ABC Street",
    "country": "VN",
    "coordinates": {
      "latitude": 10.762622,
      "longitude": 106.660172
    },
    "remote": true,
    "hybrid": true
  },
  "salary": {
    "type": "range",
    "min": 5000000,
    "max": 15000000,
    "currency": "VND",
    "period": "month",
    "isNegotiable": true,
    "benefits": [
      "transportation",
      "meals",
      "learning",
      "mentorship",
      "networking",
      "employment-opportunity"
    ]
  },
  "applicationSettings": {
    "requireCoverLetter": true,
    "requireResume": true,
    "requirePortfolio": false,
    "requireReferences": false,
    "maxApplications": 100,
    "deadline": "2024-05-31",
    "rollingBasis": false,
    "questions": [
      {
        "question": "Why are you interested in this internship?",
        "required": true,
        "type": "textarea"
      },
      {
        "question": "What is your experience with React?",
        "required": true,
        "type": "text"
      }
    ]
  },
  "status": "active",
  "isFeatured": true,
  "isUrgent": false,
  "isHot": false,
  "priority": 8,
  "contact": {
    "name": "HR Manager",
    "email": "hr@techsolutions.com",
    "phone": "0123456789",
    "linkedin": "https://linkedin.com/in/hrmanager"
  },
  "seo": {
    "keywords": ["react", "frontend", "internship", "developer"],
    "metaDescription": "Frontend Developer Internship opportunity at Tech Solutions Inc. Learn React and modern web development."
  }
}

request.description: Create a new job posting with enhanced features (employer only)
Apply for job with enhanced application form (candidate only)
Get job applications with pagination (employer only)
Update application status and add feedback (employer only)
Get job analytics and statistics (employer only)
Get similar jobs based on AI analysis
Get all jobs from a specific company
Get jobs that require specific skills
Get popular jobs based on views and applications
